ygData.subject: History Lesson For RgDan and anyone who cares... (TF G1-G2)
ygData.msgSnippet: Optimus Prime died at the hands of Megatron (or more like laser pistol) because the imputent Hot Rod tried to take him on, and Megatron used him as a shield.

Subject: History Lesson For RgDan and anyone who cares... (TF G1-G2)
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

Optimus Prime died at the hands of Megatron (or more like laser pistol) 
because the imputent Hot Rod tried to take him on, and Megatron used him as a 
shield.  (If I was Prime, I would've just fired away).  Due to earlier damage 
Prime died, passing the Matrix to Ultra Magnus.  Who later on was 'destroyed' 
by Galvatron (Unicron found Megatron and a few other Decepticons who had been 
badly beaten at Autobot City, and Starscream had discarded them into space, 
and they were remade, Galvatron is in fact Megatron) and he got the Matrix 
and tried to use it against Unicron, who swollowed him.  Hot Rod and Co. went 
to Junk (I'm skipping a lot), and made peace, then smashed through Unicron's 
eye with a Quintesson craft, then Hot Rod ended up with Galvatorn.  They 
fought, Hot Rod became Rodimus Prime THEN won.  The little scum bag 'killed' 
Unicron.  Unfortunately though, at the end of this Ultra Magnus still lived.  
Then that retard, Rodimus Prime declared it was the end of the Cybertronian 
Wars.

    Skipping ahead, Starscream's ghost made a bargain with Unicron, yaddi 
yaddi yadda, Starscream's new body was destroyed by Galvatron.  What happened 
to Unicron's head is unknown.  
    
    Skipping farther ahead, the Quintessons screw with a dead Optimus Prime's 
body.  Rodimus and a few others are chased to the ship carrying the dead 
Autobots, Optimus Prime takes their craft (or something like that) and 
escapes.  Then he leads an attack on the Quints, it is really an ambush.  
Inner problems, yaddah yaddah yaddah.  He dies.  But later it turns out human 
scientists rescued him before the explosion, then he comes back and leads the 
Autobots for the rest of the seasons.  He didn't die in the last episode 
series (at least in the American vers, I don't know about the others).  They 
were called Rebirth, a five part episode.  He never died.  No one did as far 
as it told ( in Japanese version, Sixshot killed Ultra Magnus).  Optimus 
Prime lived.  I know.  I've seen it over a dozen times, not to mention I 
bought the video from Videoflicks.com.  Anyway, just wanted that to tell you 
to get your facts straight.  Anyone want a more descriptive history, I'd be 
happy to comply.  (Natash person, e-mail Yanshosh and tell him, he'll help 
you)
